QuestData.Title: Just Another Stick in the Wall
QuestData.Description:
So, get this.
As I was flyin' in, I took the opportunity to scope out what might be a defensible position.
Just on the other side o' these boulders is an ideal clearing to hole up in. I even brought a set of blueprints to get us all settled in!
That's not too presumptuous, is it?
Anyway, whenever you're ready just hit this plunger!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Penny's Plunger to blow up the Rock Wall.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps this little creature will earn her keep after all.
